root.name: MechWarrior 4: Clan 'Mech Pak
root.description: The MechWarrior 4: Clan 'Mech Pak is an expansion pack for MechWarrior 4: Vengeance and MechWarrior 4: Mercenaries that adds new equipment and maps. The expansion adds the following in this iteration:MapsFactory (Solaris)WeaponrySMRM (swarm medium range missiles)TechnologyEnhanced OpticsBattleMechsMasakari (85 tons)Cauldron-Born (65 tons)Artic Wolf (40 tons)Kodiak (100 tons)
